dcterms:creator: M. van den Hoek
C. de Visser
D. Pool
dcterms:description: A high-fidelity non-linear simulation model of the Cessna Citation 500 business jet aircraft, built with the Delft University Aircraft Simulation Model and Analysis Tool (DASMAT) based on flight data recorded on the PH-LAB research aircraft.
dcterms:title: Cessna Citation 500 Model

dcterms:creator: F. Grondman
G. Looye
R. O. Kuchar
Q. P. Chu
E.-J. van Kampen
dcterms:description: Sensor characteristics of the Cessna Citation PH-LAB aircraft, used for flight testing and control law design.
dcterms:title: Cessna Citation PH-LAB aircraft sensor characteristics

dcterms:creator: International Air Transport Association (IATA)
dcterms:description: An analysis report detailing incidents of loss of control in-flight, highlighting the causes and implications for flight safety.
dcterms:title: Loss of Control In-Flight Accident Analysis Report

dcterms:creator: D. J. Moorhouse
R. J. Woodcock
dcterms:description: Specifications for military flying qualities of piloted airplanes, providing guidelines for aircraft performance and handling.
dcterms:title: MIL-F-8785C specifications
